name: Corpo Estranho - 3ª temporada, de Lourenço Mutarelli
headline: Corpo Estranho 3ª Temporada - A Série. Se eu fosse seu clone, contribuía!!!
budget: O orçamento para projetos anteriores a 24/02/2015 normalmente pode ser encontrado na descrição acima.
about_html:
(Please see English version at the bottom)

Você já usou um remédio e depois botou um ovo? E se de repente você percebesse que sua esposa não é a sua mulher e sim um clone de sua sogra? O que acontecerá agora com Patricha e seu clone? O mundo em que você vive é real ou é uma cópia de um mundo real? Já pensou que sua barba pode ser um implante de Super-Bonder?

Esta é a temporada final da série Corpo Estranho, que trará respostas a todas as suas perguntas e terá Exibição Inédita de Gala no CineSesc, em São Paulo. E você poderá desfilar em nosso tapete vermelho junto com toda a equipe artística!

Corpo Estranho é uma série escrita pelo aclamado roteirista, dramaturgo e desenhista Lourenço Mutarelli. **E reúne artistas incríveis como Zé do Caixão, Paulo César Peréio, o próprio Lourenço Mutarelli, Helena Ignez, Mário Bortolotto, Renata Jesion, Gilda Nomacce, Zemanuel Piñero, Roberto Alencar, Nilton Bicudo, Marcelo Lahan, Silvio Restiffe, Carlos Careqa, Tamayo Nazarian, Lianna Matheus, Adriano Costello. E outros tantos mais incríveis ainda, consagrados ou desconhecidos pela mídia.

Se você ainda não viu a 1ª e 2ª temporada da série Corpo Estranho, veja aqui: Corpo Estranho - 1ª temporada:

http://www.teatroparaalguem.com.br/peca/corpoestranhoprimeiratemporada_

Corpo Estranho - 2ª temporada:

http://www.teatroparaalguem.com.br/peca/corpoestranhosegundatemporada_

(traduzindo: Vamos fazer a Terceira Temporada!)

Corpo Estranho 3ª temporada terá exibição inédita em data e hora divulgados pela mídia impressa e virtual, no site www.teatroparaalguem.com.br e em diversas Redes Sociais e Blogs Culturais e de entretenimento. O elenco estará presente na exibição inédita, inclusive o autor. Haverá um coquetel na estreia e a distribuição de recompensas “Catarse” ocorrerá no(s) dia(s) de exibição.

Após a Exibição Inédita, a websérie ficará permanentemente disponível na Internet para acesso remoto gratuito de qualquer internauta do mundo (site bilíngue com legendas em inglês).

Sinopse de Corpo Estranho 3ª temporada Abandonada por seu marido Roperto, Patricha decide rever sua relação com os outros e consigo mesma. Guiada pela amiga Guilda ela ingressa numa absurda jornada: começa a frequentar um bar de sósias, se envolve com homens estranhos e é perseguida por passos dentro de sua própria casa. Percebemos que tudo é fruto de uma sinistra conspiração alienígena, onde Patricha é substituída por sua clone, sem que seus amigos e familiares percebam a mudança. Acontece que o experimento não é completamente bem-sucedido, e Homens de Preto são designados para eliminar os clones que se refugiam na Ilha da Fantasia, mais conhecida como a Ilha de Onolili.

(traduzindo: Sobre Nós, clones:)

Lourenço Mutarelli Com toques de surrealismo e humor característicos do autor Lourenço Mutarelli (de O Cheiro do Ralo e Natimorto) a série faz citações e referências a outras obras populares da cultura de massa (como a série estrangeira “A Ilha da Fantasia”), que acaba trazendo uma reflexão acerca das neuroses, das loucuras e das fantasias do mundo midiático atual.

José Mojica Marins (Zé do Caixão) 67 anos de experiência em cinema não é para qualquer um! Mojica nasceu, viveu e respirou a vida inteira sua paixão, e é por ela que continua a lutar, independentemente de dinheiro ou fama. Além de dirigir, esse artista multimídia e autodidata escreve, roteiriza, atua, ensina e divulga para o mundo o cinema experimental e profissional brasileiro.

Teatro Para Alguém É o primeiro grupo de teatro brasileiro, quiçá do mundo, a pesquisar, produzir, encenar, transmitir ao vivo e exibir webpeças e webséries teatrais, de forma totalmente inovadora e especialmente para a internet. www.teatroparaalguem.com.br foi criado pela atriz e diretora Renata Jesion e pelo diretor de fotografia Nelson Kao. O grupo convida diversos artistas e grupos renomados para participarem de suas produções. Desde 2008, o TPA já transmitiu ao vivo mais de 80 webpeças e 2 webséries (Corpo Estranho) teatrais inéditas. Todas as produções realizadas estão disponíveis gratuitamente para acesso a qualquer hora, de qualquer parte do mundo (o site é bilíngue). O Teatro Para Alguém hoje é visto por mais de 60 países. O trabalho inédito motivou dezenas de reportagens e levou o grupo à final do 22º Prêmio Shell de Teatro de São Paulo 2009, na categoria Especial, “Pela iniciativa de criação cênica via internet”. Em dezembro de 2010, o Grupo foi contemplado pelo "Programa Petrobrás Cultural 2010 para Cultura Digital – Apoio ao aprimoramento de websites já existentes", selecionado entre mais de 140 projetos.

Veja tudo o que a imprensa já falou e continua falando do Teatro Para Alguém nesses 5 anos de vida: http://www.teatroparaalguem.com.br/imprensa

O Teatro Para Alguém é um projeto totalmente independente. Nos seus 2 primeiros anos de vida, ergueu forças através de investimentos pessoais dos idealizadores e de outros artistas que juntos quiseram desbravar esta pesquisa, que é misturar a linguagem do audiovisual com as artes cênicas para ser veiculado nas novas mídias. Hoje o Teatro Para Alguém produz à medida em que obtém o apoio de colaboradores, festivais, editais e patrocinadores.

(traduzindo: Sua contribuição é fundamental!)

(translation: Finally here is the English version!)

Foreign Body – 3rd Season, by Lourenço Mutarelli A project in Film & Vídeo by Teatro Para Alguém

About this project: Have you ever used a medicine and then laid an egg? What if suddenly you realized your wife is not a woman but a clone of your mother-in-law? What will happen now with Patricha and her clone? Is the world you live real, or is it a copy of a real world? Have you ever thought that your beard may be a super-glue implant? This final season of Foreign Body will bring answers to all your questions and will have an exclusive gala exhibition at CineSesc, in São Paulo, Brazil. You will be able to walk on the red carpet among all the artistic team. Foreign Body is a series written by the acclaimed playwright, dramaturge and designer Lourenço Mutarelli. Gathering amazing artists like Lourenço Mutarelli himself, Zé do Caixão (Joe Coffin), Paulo César Peréio, Helena Ignez, Mário Bortolotto, Renata Jesion, Gilda Nomacce, Zemanuel Piñero, Roberto Alencar, Nilton Bicudo, Marcelo Lahan, Silvio Restiffe, Carlos Carega, Tamayo Nazarian, Lianna Matheus, Adriano Costello and many more amazing people consecrated or unknown by the media.

If you haven´t seen the 1st and 2nd seasons of Foreign Body, watch here: Foreign Body – 1st season http://www.teatroparaalguem.com.br/peca/corpoestranhoprimeiratemporada_ Foreign Body – 2nd season: http://www.teatroparaalguem.com.br/peca/corpoestranhosegundatemporada_ Foreign Body 3rd season will have unprecedented viewing at date and time to be announced by printed and online media at the website: www.teatroparaalguem.com.br, social networks and cultural and entertainment blogs. Cast will be present at the exhibition, including the author.

There will be a cocktail at the opening night and the distribution of contributions by the backers will happen at the exhibition day(s). After the first viewing the webseries will be permanently available on the internet for remote access for anyone in the world (bilingual website with English subtitles).

Foreign Body synopsis Abandoned by her husband Roperto, Patricha decides to review her relationship with others and with herself. Guided by her friend Guilda she jumps into an absurd journey: starts to attend a bar of lookalikes, get involved with strange men and is followed by steps in her own house. We realize that everything is the result of a disturbing alien plot where Patricha is replaced by her clone, without her friends and family notice the change. The experiment is not completely successful, and Men in Black are designated to exterminate the clones who take refuge in Fantasy Island, also known as the Island Onolili.

Lourenço Mutarelli With traces of surrealism and a very characteristic mood of the author Lourenço Mutarelli (of Drained and Natimorto ) the series quotes and refers to other popular pieces of mass culture (such as "Fantasy Island"), which eventually brings a reflection about the neuroses, the foolishness and fancies of the media world today.

Teatro Para Alguém Is Brazil´s first drama group, perhaps the world´s, to research, produce, perform and live broadcast webplays and webseries in an absolutely innovative way, especially through the internet. www.teatroparaalguem.com.br was created by the actress and director Renata Jesion and by the photography director Nelson Kao. The group invites several artists and other well-known drama groups to participate in their productions. Since 2008, TPA has broadcasted live 80+ webplays and 2 unreleased webseries (Foreign Body). All productions ever made are available for free and anyone can have access at anytime from anywhere in the world (the website is bilingual). Today TPA is seen by 60+ countries.

The innovative work motivated several articles which took the group to the 22nd Theater Shell Award finals, in Sao Paulo in 2009, on the special category “For the initiative of performing arts on the internet”. In December 2010, the group was awarded with the “Petrobras Cultural Program for Digital Culture – Support to develop existing websites”, selected among more than 140 projects. See everything the press has said and is still talking about TPA is this last 5 years: http://www.teatroparaalguem.com.br/imprensa

Teatro Para Alguém is a completely independent project. In its first two years It raised through personal investment of creators and other artists who together wanted to tame this research, which is mixing audio-visual language with performing arts to be aired in new media. Currently, YPA produces as it gains support of collaborator, festivals, contests and sponsors.

Budget: Artistic Team: - Author / Director / Managing Director / Producer / Art Director / Leading Cast (15 players) Supporting Role (9 players) / Sound Mixer / Costume Designer / Director of Photography + Camera Operator + Camera Assistants (4) / Photographer (3) / Executive Producer / Visual Developer/Video Editor / Original Soundtrack = R$ 65.550,00 Material for Crafting and / or lease - Set Design / Costumes / Props = R$ 5.000,00 Light/Sound/Video/ Editing equipment rental = R$ 7.200,00 Promotion and media – Advertising in movie theater / Online advertising / Magazine OFF de Teatro in Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro / Cultural portals, blogs and networks / Blog maintenance = R$ 5.000,00 Reward manufacting (Bottons/ DVDs / Posters/ Towels) = R$ 4.100,00

SUBTOTAL: R$86.850,00 Catarse Fee (13%) = R$ 12.977,59 TOTAL = R$ 99.827,59

Successful collaborative funding = audience happy + artists even happier or your $ back.

Teatro Para Alguém Is the first drama group in the world to mix audiovisual and performing arts, to produce, act out and broadcast webplays live on the internet.

Rewards: FOR R$20.00 OR MORE Share I - “EGG” – You name will be in the final credits as a thank you.

FOR R$30.00 OR MORE Share II - “CLONE” - You name will be in the final credits as a thank you + 2 invitations for the first exhibition of Foreign Body´s 3rd season.

FOR R$50.00 OR MORE Share III - “ABORIGINAL” – All previous rewards + a pin with your favourite character on it with an illustration by the author.

FOR R$70.00 OR MORE Share IV - “INTERZONZO LAB” - All previous rewards + 1 DVD with all three seasons of Foreign Body.

FOR R$100.00 OR MORE Share V - “ONOLILI” - All previous rewards +2 invitations for the first exhibition of Foreign Body´s 3rd season, 1 towel of Fantasy Island of Onolili, with illustrations by the author.

FOR R$200.00 OR MORE Share VI - “PALACE UANA-UANA INN” - All previous rewards +2 invitations for the first exhibition of Foreign Body´s 3rd season, 1 poster signed by the author at the session day.

FOR R$500.00 OR MORE Share VII - “BAR OF LOOKALIKES” – All previous rewards +2 invitations for the first exhibition of Foreign Body´s 3rd season, 1 poster signed by the author at the session day. Possibility to participate during 1 (one) shooting day for the first 8 collaborators. VII. PS: even if the backers does not want to participate at the shooting day, or if the first 8 contributions have happened you can still collaborate with this amount.

FOR R$1.000.00 OR MORE Share VIII - “LUAL OF LOOKALIKES” - All previous rewards +2 invitations for the first exhibition of Foreign Body´s 3rd season, 1 poster signed by the author at the session day. Promotion of your logotype under “Special Collaborator” at the beginning and end of the exhibition.

FOR R$3.000.00 OR MORE Share IX - “ESPECIE PATRICHA´S” - All previous rewards +2 invitations for the first exhibition of Foreign Body´s 3rd season. Promotion of your logo on the poster and highlighted at the beginning of exhibition as a “presenter”. PS: each logo will appear individually at the center of the screen and at “Special Collaborators” at the end.

PS: Shares VIII and IX are specially designed to entrepreneurs of micro, medium and big companies that have the interest of promoting their logo at the movie theater and on the internet. Share IX: we will issue a receipt or an invoice if needed.

VIDEO In 2313, Interzonzo Laboratory hired two foreign scientists. One of them speaks his own dialect.

"We need to produce the 3rd and last season of ´Foreign Body´, by Lourenço Mutarelli".

"All of this is part of a big plan by pharmaceutical company"

"A visionary series that could never been seen on the Brazilian broadcasters. The internet gives the artists freedom to create".

"- I am Patricha. Oh darling, you are not Patricha. You are Patricha´s clone".

"The sucess of the 1st and 2nd seasons was achieved but it was only possible by the collaboration of the artists themselves".

"- And him, I mean, her..."

"The money will be destined to all 44 artists involved, the series production, all the infrastructure of film equipment used, and promotion".

"The 3rd season depends on you"

"We really need you to collaborate." "You will be rewarded by God, two invitations, and several other gifts. You can watch the release at Cinesesc with us".

"- I think he is asking for money". "- Goodbye friend"

"If you don´t collaborate we won´t be able to show what happened to Patricha´s clones".

"- I´ve never seen you so clear. What is that? Such a weird sensation." "- My last wish".

"Help us to give life to Patricha´s clones. Help yourself to be happier". "Help us to be happier".

Please collaborate: www.catarse.me/en/corpoestranho
